name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rockport - Fulton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our room was very comfortable and very nice! Everything was extremely clean. The staff was wonderful. Breakfast was very yummy too. The rate for this hotel was also very affordable. If you are coming to this area for business or for a vacation, you can't pick a better hotel!
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel! Best hotel in the area!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I wanted a last minute weekend break -other hotels in area had no vacancies. This is a very nice hotel but on the expensive side. In reality, probably the nicest hotel in the area. Would stay again.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our room was very nice, large and comfortable. The bed was fresh & excellent with plenty of pillows. The overall comfort level was very high. This hotel will be on the top of our list when we return to Rockport.
reviews.title: Nicest hotel in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Went to Rockport to enjoy ourselves with family. Great time at hotel. Wished it was longer. Beds were very comfortable. Kids liked the pool and breakfast. This was their first experience staying at a hotel and still talk about it. Hotel was close to beach and restaurants.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My friend and I stayed there 7/19! We checked in about 2:00 pm and went to room to brush teeth and use the bathroom! They had just cleaned the room so we didn't inspect it too closely! We went to our function and didn't return until midnite! We went to sleep and woke up about 7 and I notice that I was itching on my arms and stomach! My friend had commented that she was congested and had watering eyes! She went get coffee.....then we discovered MOLD...MOLD..MOLD room 324 has MOLD all over the ceiling above sink in bathroom and all over the ceiling in the main room! If that room has serious mold then the whole dam place has mold!!!!!
reviews.title: Mold Mold Mold

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff make this hotel great. We stayed a week and everyone had smiles and friendly greetings for us. They put a lot of effort into customer satisfaction and is shows. The facilities were always clean and it was decorated beautifully. Breakfast was good although I had hoped they would serve bacon and they never did. The room was spacious and beautiful as well. The only thing we ran into was being on the second floor, the people above us walked stepping heavily every night and morning. We never called the front desk about it because it was no fault of the hotel or the other guests. They were quiet all night and we were not bothered too much by it. The hotel is very close to the beach and we enjoyed the science building and the aquarium in Rockport. We will be returning to see the Fulton Mansion when it reopens. Souvenir shopping and Walmart were very close. Everything was easy to access with a short drive. We also appreciated the free internet.
reviews.title: Definitely worth it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Fabulous hotel! We are repeat guests and we will return in the future. While some coastal hotels are shabby - this Hampton is clean, neat, friendly, and offers great value and service. Love the bedding, the breakfast, and the pool. Staff goes out of their way to ensure a fabulous stay.
reviews.title: Coastal getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: staff has great customer service. Breakfast had a good range of food and helps with the price per night charged for your room. Pool and gym were also great perks that compensate for your extra charges compared to what is around the local area. Overall, you get what you pay for and paying the extra services was worth the extra cost of the room per night.
reviews.title: 3night stay: pleasant, relaxing, no complaints!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Our say at the Hampton was great and worth every it. Nice room, relaxing and quiet. Within an reasonable drive (5 min or less) to the shops and beach. Internet access very good. Staff courteous and helpful.
reviews.title: Simply awesome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the very best Hampton Inn we have stayed at. Shannon at the front desk was extremely helpful during our two days in Rockport. The hotel was Very clean, quiet, and comfortable. Breakfast was excellent as was the breakfast staff.
reviews.title: Exceptional Hampton Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013
reviews.text: This hotel was clean, served a wonderful & free breakfast and was in a great location for hanging out at Rockport Beach. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast service was incredible and the woman who ran it needs her own restaurant. She was just awesome & extremely accommodating! Our family of 6
reviews.title: Great hotel for family beach vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a great time. Totally glad we stayed here.
reviews.title: Great Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff goes out of their way to help, Clean, comfortable room. Would stay here again. We liked the revolving breakfast menu. Other chains have the same thing every day. The fresh coffee available at all times was a plus.
reviews.title: Awesome Stay!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We trusted the Trip Advisor reviews on this Hampton Inn and were completely satisfied with our stay! Super clean, above and beyond staff (especially the sweet brunette woman that worked the breakfast area Monday - Friday), wonderful delicious and hot breakfast, an assortment of hot and fresh brewed coffee 24 hours a day with coffee mate flavored creamers, and fresh baked cookies everyday after 3 PM!
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in this Rockport area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will definitely be coming back! Thank you for a great stay over the 4th of July week!
reviews.title: First time visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed two nights this past weekend. The place is beautiful! Very clean, nice pool, good included breakfast, free wifi, friendly/helpful staff. Our room had a small fridge and microwave.
reviews.title: Very Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: I would love to give 5 starts, but... The first night I got into bed and started to feel wet. Something had been spilled on the mattress, and as soon as I sat down everything above became saturated. To her credit, without complaint and with a smile, at 11 PM the front desk girl brought up new bedding and my husband helped her flip the mattress. I'm not sure how something like this could be missed by housekeeping. The sink also drained quite slowly. Towels were plentiful but a bit thin.
reviews.title: Top notch staff (mostly), nice and clean!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012
reviews.text: I wish the Rockport area was more affordable (hotel-wise) so I could visit more often. The Hampton was priced in line with other hotels in the area. Everything was booked, but I think $240 (taxes included) a night is a bit much for this area.
reviews.title: Clean rockport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family recently stayed at this Hampton Inn as part of a long beach weekend. I am typically skeptical of the average independently-owned beach hotel/motel. Most of them seem run-down or just not clean and tidy, hence my personal preference for corporate chain hotels (in these circumstances).
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This Hampton is the #1 rated hotel in town on Tripadvisor, and it has certainly earned that ranking. The hotel is very nice and tidy, grounds are well maintain and aesthetically pleasing. Our room was ready upon our arrival, and the staff at the front desk were charming and courteous. The front desk has a massive aquarium, which is really a sight to see. The room itself was nice and typical for a Hampton. Bonus points for the DirecTV service in the room, as this added some options for our kids.
reviews.title: Excellence Comfort and Style

aka: Hampton Inn And Suites Rockport - Fulton
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Rockport-Fulton hotel features 64 elegantly appointed guest rooms, and 24 oversized studio suites, providing the ultimate convenience and comfort. You will feel right at home whether you’re in town for business or enjoying a peaceful sea side escape. Our finely appointed guestrooms are equipped with every modern convenience while maintaining the look and feel of the surrounding area. All rooms feature free high speed internet access, hairdryer, iron and ironing board, coffee maker and 42" LCD HDTVs with over 60 HD channels. Start each morning with our free hot breakfast.
